channel.title: [508 client] Connect only if on client [HELP!]
channel.description: I am trying to figure out how to make it so that no1 can get on my server unless they use my client. please help?

item.title: [508 client] Connect only if on client [HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

It’s very difficult, Easiest way is to rewrite the loader so your server IP is hidden and don’t tell anyone it.
